message.body: Hey! Is this the weekend that you're in Philly?
Nope. I'll be in next weekend starting on Thursday night or Friday morning.
Awww okay. Well I'll see you then, haha. How was your week?
Pretty busy. I worked 10 days for most of the week, but I'll be going back to a more normal schedule next week.
Yours? Are you teaching full time now?
Oh gosh! Don't over work yourself! Yeah, I'm full time. I'm not sure if I told you about it. I'm a technology teacher in the Kensington section of Philly
. It's not very exciting, mostly I teach the kids this one math program online and mess around with ancient MacBooks, lol.
Have you been there since before October? I think I heard about that, but I thought you got a new job.
By the way, math is awesome. You should teach them algebra and stuff.
No, I started in December. Haha yeah this program is actually really cool. It's a non-verbal problem solving game and according to what grade they're in,
it teaches anything from one to one correspondence all the way to beginning algebra.
Haha I don't think so. The school gets it through a grant. You need an access code for the kids to play.
Oh. That kinda blows. I wanted to try it out, lol
